course_title: Cost Effectiveness in Health and Medicine

learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate knowledge about role of economic thinking in public health policy, planning, and priority-setting
Describe and distinguish key economic methods used in public health evaluation
Apply core concepts of economic evaluation to conduct and interpret a basic cost-effectiveness analysis using decision-analytic modelling.
Critically assess the quality, transparency, and policy relevance of published economic evaluations using established reporting standards
Communicate economic evidence clearly and persuasively to diverse stakeholders

assessments.task_description:
In Assessment 2, you will be asked to complete an evaluation of a published economic evaluation study. There are two parts: 

Part 1 – Individual Assessment: Read the assigned paper and complete the CHEERS checklist.  

Part 2 – Group Assessment: With your group members, prepare and present a short discussion about the reporting quality of the assigned paper and reflect on what can be improved.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.assessment_title: Appraisal of an economic evaluation study
assessments.task_description:

assessments.weighting: <dd>50%  [2 parts: 25% Excel model, and 25% cost effectiveness analysis report] </dd>
assessments.task_description: Conduct an economic evaluation using Excel, designed to examine all learning outcomes. The project description will be released in week 5. From Week 6, there will be 1-hour practical session (during the regular contact hour: Wednesday 1-4pm), where students learn to develop a Markov model in Excel and use this model to conduct a cost-effectiveness analysis. During the practical session, students are encouraged to work with each other (facilitated by the teaching team).
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.topic:
Workshops

Interactive lectures and tutorials in a workshop format will be presented. These will include practical exercises in Excel.
